metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the halfling customer in Felogyr's Fireworks. Can give a little context to the shop without having to have all of it Avery's dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Halfling in the Fireworks House in CTY_Main_A near coords: 2, 16, -127

0.speaker: Robbin Datherswick
0.text: He's a bit of a genius isn't he? At sales, not fireworks. 'Course it helps to have the only licence in town to sell the stuff.

1.speaker: Robbin Datherswick
1.text: You'd think his business would suffer in winter at least, but it's booming all year round.
